Name: Havoc Petrol
AttributesDescription: Increases Havoc DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: A compound potion that enhances offensive capabilities. It combines a potion efficacy catalyst with different solution developed for different resonance properties. When not in use, the two compounds separate naturally and need to be shaken well before use and then applied to the weapon.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Havoc DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
